title: Jim Jefferies
description:
This week Jim Jefferies joins Kevin on the podcast. They discuss everything from how a punch to the head became his big break in comedy, being asked to be a judge on Australia’s Got Talent, what it’s like performing at atheist conventions, and the difference between going sober in the US and in Australia.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Jim Jeffries, Kevin Hart)
